title: UHVDB/toolkit pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

project.errorMessage: BioProject ID or Project identifier for a study.

group.errorMessage: Group that a sample is a member of (used for coassembly).

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ1 files cannot contain spaces and must have extension 'fastq', or 'fq' all optionally gzipped.

fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ 2 files cannot contain spaces and must have extension 'fastq', or 'fq' all optionally gzipped.

fna.errorMessage: Fasta (FNA) files cannot contain spaces and must have extension 'fasta', 'fa', or 'fna' all optionally gzipped.

virus_fna.errorMessage: Virus fasta (FNA) files cannot contain spaces and must have extension 'fasta', 'fa', or 'fna' all optionally gzipped.
